EmailTemplate.subject: Your reward for completing a meeting with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our 2018 Community Survey and taking a meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. YourÂ time is greatly appreciated and we hope you enjoyed your personalized demonstration! As a gift for your time, here's your $50.00 Amazon.com gift card. Please follow the link below to claim this offer.
If you have any further questions regarding Turbonomic, visit our resource center <[[resources.turbonomic.com]]> or reach out to your Turbonomic Account Executive.
{{my.Gift 50:default=}}
Regards, Team Turbonomic
